task.name: viewerconnection
task.shortdescription: Scripting connection to the CASA Viewer
task.description: This provides a scripting interface to the CASA Viewer

param.name: name
param.description: (Optional) name of the viewer to which we wish to connect (defaults to first available)

task.example:
This provides a connection interface to the CASA Viewer. The only parameter is the name of the viewer to which we wish to connect.
The names of the available viewers can be found with viewerinstances(). It is also possible to have viewer( ) return a viewerconnection.
